sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Container from './components/Container.js' import BackgroundImage from './components/BackgroundImage.js' import BigText from './components/BigText.js' import Navbar from './components/Navbar.js' import Card from './components/Card.js' import Button from './components/Button.js' import InfoSelectorBar from './components/InfoSelectorBar.js' import InfoSelectorItem from './components/InfoSelectorItem.js' import SignUpForm from './components/SignUpForm.js' import Img from './components/Img.js' import bg from './bg.jpg' import bg2 from './bg2.jpg' import styled from 'styled-components'; import portalX_badge from './portalX_badge.png' const Style = styled.div` user-select: none; .bottomButton { margin-top: 40px; padding: 10px 50px 10px 50px; } .scrollContainer { height: 100vh; scroll-behavior: smooth; overflow-y: scroll; scroll-snap-type: y proximity; .scrollItem { scroll-snap-align: start; } } footer { background-color: #111; .scrollItem { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 400px; } p { font-size: 0.8rem; color: white; padding-top: 100px; text-align: right; line-height: 50px; .email { user-select: all; color: #47FFC4; } } } `; function App() { const [infoToShow, setInfo] = useState('experience'); const [seatReserved, setReserved] = useState(false); return ( ); } export default App;
